CustomField.description: Formula field to return a translated version of Description__c if user is using Salesforce in a different language. Depending on userâ€™s language locale, can return Description__c, Description_Language_1__c, Description_Language_2__c, or Description_Language_3__c. Displayed in ManageIndicators, SetTargets, and AddResults.
CustomField.label: Indicator Definition Translated
